questions.question: 1.Consider your watch as a system and set the time 2 minutes ahead in “SetTime” mode. Identify the suitable precondition(s) for the use case document design.

answers.a: a.The watch is showing current time.
answers.c: c.The Watch is switched to set mode.

questions.question: 2.Which of the following statements is true about identifying objects and classes in a software system?

answers.a: a.An object represents an instance of a class, which defines a set of properties and methods that all instances of the class share.
answers.b: b.A class represents an instance of an object, which defines a set of properties and methods that can be customized for each instance of the class.
answers.c: c.An object is a blueprint that defines the properties and methods of a set of instances, while a class represents a specific instance of that blueprint.
answers.d: d.A class and an object are the same thing, and the terms can be used interchangeably.

questions.question: 3.Which actors are involved in the 'Release a Vehicle' use case for the car rental application?

answers.c: c.Both the Office Executive and the Customer
